fleet_management.content: Fleet management solutions help you manage fleet operations, leading to reduced costs, improved efficiency and increased compliance. The right fleet management solution can be instrumental in coordinating your fleet management activities.
fleet_management.content3: - Safe zone warning via SMS or App Notification
fleet_management.content4: - Low battery warning via SMS or App Notification

asset_management.content: Asset management solutions help you track assets through the use of RFID tags attached to them. Tags are read by a fixed scanner mounted in a fixed position. Every time a tag is read, it will be aggregated into a string and sold to the system as a total of all scanned RFIDs. Besides, the solution also warns you of missing RFIDs or strange RFIDs to help you avoid missing assets.
asset_management.content3: - Warning of missing RFID, strange RFID via SMS or App Notification
asset_management.content4: - Process message sets sent by devices (merge messages, check duplicates)
asset_management.content5: - Register new RFID by list or edit small quantity
